channel.title: Statistical Process Monitoring on YoungStatS
channel.description: Recent content in Statistical Process Monitoring on YoungStatS

item.title: Functional Regression Control Chart: a New Framework for Profile Monitoring
item.description: Introduction New statistical process control (SPC) methods have to be developed in order to handle more and more complex data, which are available because of the advent of new data acquisition technologies. In particular, in many practical situations the quality characteristic of a process can be modelled as a function defined on a compact domain, data of such kind are the foundation of a rapidly expanding area of statistics referred to as functional data analysis (FDA).
